cons: I really enjoy working at the WinShape Foundation, I cannot think of a single con.

pros: WinShape provides a wonderful salary and benefits package to employees (although there is a wide discrepancy between entry-level and upper management positions). They are actively seeking to improve the employee culture and communication within the organization. They are on mission and committed to their purpose. The founders are wonderful and appropriately involved. They provide many opportunities for professional development and personal growth. (Some departments do this better than others.) The leadership team is asking good questions and seeking to improve in areas that are lacking. They are innovative and constantly looking to grow and improve.
cons: There are few opportunities for internal advancement. Inconsistency throughout departments (in policy, salary, values, etc).

pros: By far the best work culture I have ever experienced. Managers actually listen to everyone, care, and take action. Tons of perks: free lunch, free clothes, travel opportunities, and the benefits for full-time team members are unreal.
cons: Sometimes the hours can get pretty long, but other than that, very few, if any, cons.

pros:
Great organization, great experience to help college student start preparing for any future career. Great values. Tons of encouragement and great potential to grow in the company.

pros outweigh the cons
